name: Cosmic Ball FREE
description:
Play an amazing full-featured 3D Basketball game in space - A new idea in sport game that every can play!

Use your quick reflexes to move the platform into place before the basketball drifts off into space. And, use the controls to make the ball more or less bouncy. It’s all about smart strategy if you want to get the basketball in the hoop!
With high resolution 3D graphics, Cosmic Ball is an out of this world game you won’t want to put down.


MAIN FEATURES

- 3D graphics and special effects
- Realistic physics engine
- 9 challenging levels
- 10 different beautiful ball skins
- GameCenter integration : show off your top scores to your friends.

HOW TO PLAY

Tilt your device to catch the ball and launch it into nets as fast as you can,
then admire the projection you've just made!
